comments: He should be a middle school teacher not a college professor. He plays favorites in class and depends strongly on class leaders so he can watch.
overall great class, good energy and i learned a lot! if you love journalism, you will be insired

I didn\'t enjoy his class and I felt like the material he brought up during lecture was irrelevant to the course mostly. I would have much rather stuck to the topic of journalism outlets oppose to viral videos and stuff like that. The assignments weren\'t very structured and he was hard to reach for help.
Class was very scattered as it was the first run. But Michael was an interesting teacher and his assignments were fun and challenging. Grading was moderately lenient. Pretty Good teacher!
